map cancer rates for selected sites to MA counties

Source: R/mass_map.R
mass_cancer_map.Rd

map cancer rates for selected sites to MA counties

mass_cancer_map(site = "breast")

Arguments

body_site

character(1) defaults to "breast", can also take value "prostate"

Examples

mass_cancer_map()
